name: Satori's Mind Games
description:
Satori wants to practice her mind-reading skills, so she goes to the surface to train with Reimu. A short but sweet visual novel.

Reimu and Satori is such an interesting pairing, but there's so little about it online. That's one of the reasons I made this game.

(This was made in less than 24 hours aaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh)

Writing, Programming, and Graphics: Megapig9001

Music: Peacock Roy

Inspired by Naalune's entry "what matters most"; go check it out!
